entry.title: Tec2nisk
entry.summary: Tec2nisk (ASTA MARI b2B Louie32) Tec2nisk redefine techno with their track selection and genre fluidity. They distinguish themselves from the mainstream, taking listeners on a captivating and unpredictable journey through the depths of electronic music that is as brutal as it is mesmerizing. Prepare for a fusion of hardcore, acid, trance, breakbeat and electro.
entry.content:
Tec2nisk (ASTA MARI b2B Louie32)
Tec2nisk redefine techno with their track selection and genre fluidity. They distinguish themselves from the mainstream, taking listeners on a captivating and unpredictable journey through the depths of electronic music that is as brutal as it is mesmerizing. Prepare for a fusion of hardcore, acid, trance, breakbeat and electro.

entry.title: Matriark
entry.summary: Copenhagen-based producer & DJ, Matriark has justifiably earned her spot in the worldwide clubbing scene. Her music productions and DJing energy reflect the 90s and 00s trance era, but also expand the genre with sentimental value additions of the current era. Being a part of the infamous Bunkerbauer collective, a resident at Den Anden Side, one half of duo PLAZA, co-founder of Megatech Industries and a DRIFT Kyiv resident, the Norwegian artist is currently one of the most reliable trance equipment creators around.
entry.content:
Copenhagen-based producer & DJ, Matriark has justifiably earned her
spot in the worldwide clubbing
scene. Her music productions and DJing energy reflect the 90s and 00s
trance era, but also expand the genre with sentimental value additions
of the current era. Being a part of the infamous Bunkerbauer
collective, a resident at Den Anden Side, one half of duo PLAZA,
co-founder of Megatech Industries and a DRIFT Kyiv resident, the
Norwegian artist is currently one of the most reliable trance
equipment creators around.

entry.title: Eline B
entry.summary: Eline B har i flere år produceret undergrundsarrangementer i Odense. Hun er kendt som initiativtageren til Hulen, Odeology og WATERPLZ. Eline ved, hvad et dansegulv har brug for. Hendes mixes bevæger sig mellem house, disco og techno, men på denne seneste sommernat dedikerer hun sig til techno. Link: https://www.mixcloud.com/ElineB89/eline-b-aarhus-techno-discrict-volume-village-15march-2024/
entry.content:
Eline B har i flere år produceret undergrundsarrangementer i Odense. Hun er kendt som initiativtageren til Hulen, Odeology og WATERPLZ. Eline ved, hvad et dansegulv har brug for. Hendes mixes bevæger sig mellem house, disco og techno, men på denne seneste sommernat dedikerer hun sig til techno.

Link: https://www.mixcloud.com/ElineB89/eline-b-aarhus-techno-discrict-volume-village-15march-2024/

entry.title: pace+lead
entry.summary: pace+lead (he/him) is a sound designer by day and electronic experimentalist at night. He’s been a part of the electronic music scene in Odense for years and is a resident DJ at Odeology and Waterplz as well as co-founder of the latter. pace+lead breathes experimentation and has a borderless approach to genres in his own music. His latest EP-release "Escape" is a five track personal therapeutic flee into a universe of contrasts. A euphoric address where fast and rolling grooves live side by side with weird beats and dark pop with distorted vocals. The entanglement of the sonic entities is an industrial landscape driven by emotional expression. This exploration will be further explored in upcoming releases in 2024. Alien sounds, liquidy atmospheres and sticky grooves should be expected to hit your sensory canal system when he’s to be found behind the decks. The subgenres in his sets can vary from tribal techno to trippy trance and hacker electro but hypnosis is always the driving force of the pace+lead ufo. Link: https://on.soundcloud.com/FAangstSyQxnbhBfA
entry.content:
pace+lead (he/him) is a sound designer by day and electronic experimentalist at night. He’s
been a part of the electronic music scene in Odense for years and is a resident DJ at
Odeology and Waterplz as well as co-founder of the latter.
pace+lead breathes experimentation and has a borderless approach to genres in his own

of contrasts. A euphoric address where fast and rolling grooves live side by side with weird
beats and dark pop with distorted vocals. The entanglement of the sonic entities is an
industrial landscape driven by emotional expression. This exploration will be further explored
in upcoming releases in 2024.
Alien sounds, liquidy atmospheres and sticky grooves should be expected to hit your

can vary from tribal techno to trippy trance and hacker electro but hypnosis is always the

Link: https://on.soundcloud.com/FAangstSyQxnbhBfA

entry.title: Bilibili
entry.summary: BiliBili forkæler dansegulvets folk med en atmosfære af sexy og groovy prog trance og gammel tech house, der presser de +140 bpm. Efter at have pushet musik hele sit liv, har BiliBili fundet et specielt sted i sig for den nostalgiske halvfemser Goa-lyd og nuller UK-tech scene. Dog skal man regne med at blive overrasket med musik fra adskillige andre scener også - især den franske freetek- og Detroit electro scene. Link: https://soundcloud.com/bilibilixx/mix
entry.content:
BiliBili forkæler dansegulvets folk med en atmosfære af sexy og groovy prog trance og gammel tech house, der presser de +140 bpm. Efter at have pushet musik hele sit liv, har BiliBili fundet et specielt sted i sig for den nostalgiske halvfemser Goa-lyd og nuller UK-tech scene. Dog skal man regne med at blive overrasket med musik fra adskillige andre scener også - især den franske freetek- og Detroit electro scene. 
 
Link: https://soundcloud.com/bilibilixx/mix

entry.title: SEKVENS DJ FESTIVAL 30/8-1/9 2024
entry.summary: SEKVENS DJ FESTIVAL will be born on the 30st of August in the last summer days of the year 2024. The FESTIVAL is within cycling distance from SVENDBORG (south of Funen, Denmark), and takes place among firs and deciduous trees on Aserbo's beautiful grounds, where there is room for adventure between the viking barns and midieval tower. COCKTAILS – DANCEABLE DJs – BEACH – BEAUTIFUL PEOPLE – TENT PLACE IN SHADY FOREST - MEDIEVAL CASTLE TOWER DANCE FLOOR SEKVENS DJ FESTIVAL is a small, exclusive festival! Follow this page for continuous updates on the DJ line-up, as well as INFO about when ticket sales start. Tickets: Purchase tickets via MobilePay: Choose ticket price: 600kr for all dayse 350kr for one day Supply your: NAME + SURNAME + EMAIL (example: john doe john@doe.com) in the message field! Send to Mobile Pay box: 2898YQ The payment is your ticket together with the details of the message field. Tickets include dinner and brunch. When you buy a ticket, you also become a member of the association SEKVENS. The festival is for adults only ... and no animals, apart from those already in the forest :-) Location (click image for directions) Contact: asmusbusck+sekvensburo@gmail.com
entry.content:
SEKVENS DJ FESTIVAL will be born on the 30st of August in the last summer days of the year 2024.
 
The FESTIVAL is within cycling distance from SVENDBORG (south of Funen, Denmark), and takes place among firs and deciduous trees on Aserbo's beautiful grounds, where there is room for adventure between the viking barns and midieval tower.

COCKTAILS – DANCEABLE DJs – BEACH – BEAUTIFUL PEOPLE – TENT PLACE IN SHADY FOREST - MEDIEVAL CASTLE TOWER DANCE FLOOR

 
SEKVENS DJ FESTIVAL is a small, exclusive festival!
Follow this page for continuous updates on the DJ line-up, as well as INFO about when ticket sales start.

Tickets:

Purchase tickets via MobilePay:
  1. Choose ticket price:
    600kr for all dayse
    350kr for one day
  2. Supply your:
    NAME + SURNAME + EMAIL (example: john doe john@doe.com)
    in the message field!
  3. Send to Mobile Pay box: 2898YQ
  4. The payment is your ticket together with the details of the message field.

Tickets include dinner and brunch. When you buy a ticket, you also become a member of the association SEKVENS.
The festival is for adults only ... and no animals, apart from those already in the forest :-)

Location (click image for directions)

Links

  • Facebook event 
  •  

Contact: asmusbusck+sekvensburo@gmail.com
